name: 陳世楷
objective: The objective of this course is to introduce the management and control of water resources which requires the conception, planning, and execution of designs to make efficient use of the water or avoid damage from too much water.
schedule:
週次　　授課內容
1   Introduction
2   Descriptive hydrology
3   Quantitative Hydrology
4   Groundwater—basic principle
5   Groundwater—well hydraulics
6   Probability Concepts in Planning
7   Reservoir
8   Reservoir & Dams
9　　Mid-term exam.
10  Dams & Spillway,gates and outlet works
11  Open Channels
12  Open Channels
13  Pressure Conduits
14  Irrigation
15  Irrigation
16  Water-Supply System
17  Flood-Damage Mitigation
18       Final exam.
materials: Ray K. Linsley et al.,Water-resources Engineering, McGRAW_HILL International Editions, 2007.
